channel.title: Keeping a server up 24/7
channel.description: I'm fine in all other areas, but whats the cheapest/free way to keep a server up 24/7, I don't mind if it's slightly laggy because I can always upgrade as I go along

item.title: Keeping a server up 24/7
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Zenadix:

LOL NUB, do you ever know what a server crash is?

I think you just proved DavidDavidson’s above post to be correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Keeping a server up 24/7
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

A server doesn’t have to crash, write one properly and you’ll be fine without the need for any sort of “auto restarter”.

Read full topic

item.title: Keeping a server up 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Zenadix Zenadix
item.description:
@Zenadix wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:6, topic:351316”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=447675.msg3285579#msg3285579 date=1280180758]
No server can stay up 24/7, You’ll need a server restarter depending on how stable your server is i suggest setting it to 30Minutes.
[/quote]

Wrong. A server can stay up 24-7, it’s just that you guys are too retarded to actually make one that works properly.[/quote]

LOL NUB, do you ever know what a server crash is?

Read full topic

item.title: Keeping a server up 24/7
item.dc:creator: @DavidDavidson DavidDavidson
item.description:
@DavidDavidson wrote:

monkey4015:

The other bigish servers you see that are on 24/7, do any of them have just the program open, or do they all pay for decicated servers?

VPS or dedicated host

Read full topic

item.title: Keeping a server up 24/7
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

monkey4015:

I’m fine in all other areas, but whats the cheapest/free way to keep a server up 24/7, I don’t mind if it’s slightly laggy because I can always upgrade as I go along

Leave the program open 24/7

Or BUY a VPS or Dedicated server, keeping something online 24/7 through another computer isn’t cheap.

Read full topic
